descp2: If true, then ensure that at least one ngram is generated for each input sequence.  In particular, if an input sequence is shorter than `min(ngram_width) + 2*pad_width`, then generate a single ngram containing the entire sequence.  If false, then no ngrams are generated for these short input sequences.
